Defaults.Title: Item Pile Configuration
Defaults.EnabledPileExplanation: Causes this actor to act as an item pile.
Defaults.DisplayOneExplanation: If the pile is a single item, this sets the pile token's image to be the image of the item.

DropItem.Title: Dropping Item
DropItem.ExistingPiles: There's already an item pile at this location, you will add your item(s) to this pile.
DropItem.QuantityToDrop: You have {quantity} of this item, how many do you want to drop?
DropItem.LockedWarning: This item pile is locked and cannot be opened - you can't drop items in it.

Quantity.Title: Item quantity attribute
Quantity.Label: Here you can configure what the attribute path is for an item's quantity. For example, in the 5e system, each item's quantity is in each item's 'item.data.data.quantity', so you'd put `data.quantity' in this setting.

DeleteEmptyPiles.Title: Auto-delete empty piles
DeleteEmptyPiles.Label: This causes item piles to delete themselves once they run out of items.

PreloadFiles.Title: Preload Files
PreloadFiles.Label: Causes files (images and audio) of piles to be preloaded, resulting in a seamless experience.

Debug.Title: Enable debugging
Debug.Label: Prints debug messages to the console
